[[WP:AWB/T|Typo fixing]] , typos fixed: adminstrators â administrators, bankrupcy â bankruptcy, developped â developed, emmigrate â emigrate, guranteed â guaranteed, recieved â received, reccommendati
/* Lavon affair */ put foreign relations here
/* Foreign relations of the State of Israel */ move section up
/* Middle East peace process */ section on peace with jordan
/* Immigration from the former Soviet Union */ add ethiopia
/* The early years */ on second thought, extra heading unnecessary
/* Egyptian-Israeli Peace Process */ not just process
/* Lavon affair */ add section on german reparations - vital for israeli economy
/* The early years */ add introductory sentence for new section + reference. Note: there is way too much emphasis on Lavon affair
/* After the founding of the State of Israel */
/* Establishment of the state */ war of independence section, separate from establishment
/* Founding of the State and War of Independence */
/* The British Mandate for Palestine */ heading
/* The Lavon Affair */ put references on the bottom
/* The British Mandate of Palestine */ FOR palestine
/* Visit of the Pope */ the visit of the pope does not deserve a section of its own unless relations with vatican are discussed

/* Lebanon */ fixed the chronology; the ceasefire ended rocket attacks until after Argov assassination. Coastal Road was proximate cause of 1978 war
